      int currentCursor
      Variable to decide which cursor to be used Currently init the cursor to use the normal colour cursor

      static int CursorCol
      Initialise the coordinate of the cursor
      static boolean cursorColour
      The cursor colour variable used to determine the status of the colour, By default it will be false meaning default cursor colour When the cursor colour is true meaning perform operation to change the colour of the cursor
